DOC.brief_summary: Cimicifuga racemosa ( black cohosh ) rhizome root extract use treat menopausal symptom . To date , still scarce information efficacy Thai woman menopausal symptom . The purpose study assess efficacy black cohosh extract management menopausal symptom Thai woman .
DOC.brief_title: Black Cohosh Extract Management Moderate Severe Menopausal Symptoms Thai Women
DOC.criteria: Thai woman , age ≥ 40 year Peri postmenopause Moderate severe menopausal symptom Kupperman menopausal index score least 20 Using drug hormonal treatment within 1 month enrollment BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 Allergic drug ingredient Liver disease AST ≥ 37 U/L ALT ≥ 40 U/L total bilirubin ≥ 1 mg/dL direct bilirubin ≥ 0.3 mg/dL Psychiatric disease Alcohol consumption elicit drug use Vegetarian ( may consume phytoestrogen )
